object_name.value: Validate user is a member of cd_controlled_print_recallers group

title.value: Ensures the user is allowed to carry out certain privileged operations restricted to Controlled Print Coordinators Recallers group.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
You need to be a member of the Controlled Print Coordinators Recallers group (cd_controlled_print_recallers) in order to use this function.
dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where not exists (select group_name from dm_group where group_name = 'cd_controlled_print_recallers' and any i_all_users_names = '$USER')
